mainTitle: What about doing some cleaning in your address book?

analyse.title: Let’s analyze your contacts
analyse.content: How messy is your adress book? Super-clean? Or with clones, empty or useless contacts everywhere? TouchUp will tell you all about it!

play.title: Improving while playing
play.content: You can resolve all your adress book issues while having fun and playing TouchUp little games!

keep.title: Keep control
keep.content: TouchUp will never make an action without asking you to check it before! You decide what you want to keep or not.

be-afraid-of.title: Always keep your contacts safe
be-afraid-of.content: Because we know that your contacts are precious to you, you can restore your deleted contacts whenever you want!

forget.title: Never forget your contacts birthday
forget.content: We notify you for each birthday and you can write directly a message to the lucky one

say.title: Your contacts will be grateful
say.cta: I want to test this cool app

levels.title: Les Jeux sur TouchUp
levels.description: L'idée de cette application est de vous permettre de nettoyer votre carnet de contact aussi facilement que si vous etiez en train de jouer
levels.more: Et pleins d'autres jeux à venir...

games.title: Les jeux sur TouchUp
games.description: L'idée de cette application est de vous permettre de nettoyer votre carnet de contact aussi facilement que si vous etiez en train de jouer
games.more: Et pleins d'autres jeux à venir...
